Blog.post: So the new maps for SC:PT are only available if you buy them for $5 USD (6.82 CAD). I don't know if there are other games that have done this, or not, but it's certainly the first game that I own that has done this. Frankly, I think it sets a disturbing precident. So in addition to buying the game ($64.99), subscribing to Xbox Live (Starter Kit: $99.99 CAD), they now want another 6.82 for 2 new maps. Whats next? Pay-per-use downloadable content? "Only 10c/min to play on this map!" Yeesh.
